com.percussion.integration
Class PSItem

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.integration.PSItem

public class PSItem
extends Object

This class is used to store a content item from Rhythmyx retrieved by the search action into a PSSearch object. This class is used for both directions on the search, it is used as the query field definition and the result item for each content item returned. @see PSSearch for more information.

Constructor Summary
PSItem()
          Default constructor to create an empty item.

Constructor Detail

PSItem

public PSItem()
Default constructor to create an empty item. Content id is -1, and the title's initial value will be null.

Method Detail

addSelectField

public void addSelectField(String fieldName)
Adds the specified field name to the list of fields to be retrieved. This is used for search when asking for the fields to be returned. This field is considered an INPUT field for search.

Parameters:
fieldName - the internal Rhythmyx field name, assumed not null or empty

addQueryField

public void addQueryField(String fieldName,
                          String value,
                          String operator,
                          String connector)
Adds the specified field name and it's value representing a query where clause. This is used for search when creating the query to search for specific content items. This field is considered an INPUT field for search.

Parameters:
fieldName - the internal Rhythmyx field name, assumed not null or empty
value - the value for the specified field to search on, assumed not null or empty
operator - the query operator for this where clause, default = "like" may be null or empty
connector - the query join value, default = "and", may be null or empty

addResultField

public void addResultField(String fieldName,
                           String value)
Adds the specified field name and it's value representing a result item from a search. This is used to store content item results from a search. This field is considered an OUTPUT field for search.

Parameters:
fieldName - the internal Rhythmyx field name, assumed not null or empty
value - the value of the specified field that was searched, assumed not null, may be empty

addActionPageField

public void addActionPageField(String value)
Adds the Action Menu field which is a special field that is identified by the constant ACTION_PAGE_FIELD, it's value is the data returned from the getActionPageLink method call. This field is considered an OUTPUT field for search.

Parameters:
value - the action menu html of the specified item that was searched, assumed not null, may be empty

toHTML

public String toHTML()
Convert this field to it's HTML equivalent. Effectively returns a table row (TR) of this item.

Returns:
an HTML string representing this row within a table, never null or empty

toHTML

public String toHTML(List columnList,
                     boolean header)
See toHTML(columnList, header) for details

toHTML

public String toHTML(List columnList,
                     boolean header,
                     int sortColumn)
Convert this field to it's HTML equivalent. Effectively returns a table row (TR) of this item. If the columnList parameter is not null or 0 size, we return each field's HTML in the columnList order, otherwise we return all the fields as HTML.

Parameters:
columnList - a list of internal field names as strings, these are to determine the order and visibility of each of the fields within this item, may be null or empty
header - if true, we must output the column header for each field within this item, otherwise we return the HTML for for each field with the value
sortColumn - column that is being sorted on, this is used to mark that column's header
Returns:
an HTML string representing this row within a table, never null or empty

addHTMLAttribute

public void addHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with this item.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

clearHTMLAttributes

public void clearHTMLAttributes()
Clears the current attributes for this item.

addHeaderHTMLAttribute

public void addHeaderHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with the header within this item.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

clearHeaderHTMLAttributes

public void clearHeaderHTMLAttributes()
Clears the current attributes for this item.

addHeaderFieldHTMLAttribute

public void addHeaderFieldHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with each field's header within this item.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

addFieldHTMLAttribute

public void addFieldHTMLAttribute(String attribute)
Adds an attribute to the current set of attributes associated with each field within this item.

Parameters:
attribute - the HTML representation of an attribute, assumed not null or empty, the spaceseparator will be added by this routine automatically

clearFieldHTMLAttributes

public void clearFieldHTMLAttributes()
Clears the current attributes for each field within each item within this search.

getContentId

public int getContentId()
Get the content id of this item, this is the Rhythmyx content id.

Returns:
the content id as an int, -1 indicates it has not been set

getTitle

public String getTitle()
Get the title of this item, this is the Rhythmyx title of the content item.

Returns:
the title string, may be null or empty

getFieldMap

public Map getFieldMap()
Get the field map for this item, this contains string keys for the internal Rhythmyx field names.

Returns:
the map of fields for this item, will not be null, may be an empty map
